bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XVII. France V. Published by Hartmut Atsma, Robert Marichal, Jan-Olof Tjäder and Jean Vezin.
bibl.note: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XVII. France V. Published by Hartmut Atsma, Robert Marichal, Jan-Olof Tjäder and Jean Vezin.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1984, in fol., vii-92 pp., ill.
